item.title: Essential Techniques for Leading Software Teams in the Work From Home Era
item.description: Learn essential leadership techniques for remote work.

item.title: Work-From-Home Essentials Cheat Sheet
item.description: Use this cheat sheet as a checklist for the essential needs of teams making a change to working-from-home (WFH). These are recommended minimum requirements for WFH. Companion to the Skills Matter talk of 13 August 2020.
